summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing market conditions and potential financial implications. It includes a warning about the worsening market situation and mentions hedge funds and private equity. The communication is primarily informational and contains disclaimers regarding confidentiality and legal privilege.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is the sender of the email discussing market conditions.

keyFacts: The email discusses worsening market conditions as of September 15, 2008.
It mentions hedge funds and private equity in the context of financial instruments.
The communication includes disclaimers about confidentiality and legal privilege.
There is a warning that the market is starting to fray.
The email is intended for informational purposes only and not as an official offer.
